## We offer consultation, design, development, testing and support for your digital projects.

[**Digitalization Consulting** \
\
Gain insights on leveraging digital tech and strategies for enhanced operations, efficiency, and competitiveness.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/services/digitalization-consulting)

[**UI / UX Design** \
\
Engage your users with exceptional UI/UX design with the goal of enhancing the overall user experience and satisfaction.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/services/ui-/-ux-design)

[**Development** \
\
We craft digital solutions with precision, using the perfect blend of creativity and logic, tailored to diverse user needs.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/services/development)

[**Testing / QA** \
\
We ensure flawless software delivery by rigorously testing for defects, validating functionality, and meeting quality standards.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/services/testing/qa)

[**Managed IT Services** \
\
Our Managed IT Services are designed to support your business goals by providing a robust, reliable, and secure IT environment.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/services/managed-it-services)

[**E-commerce** \
\
We create scalable e-commerce concepts and platforms using the perfect tools and technologies.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/solutions/e-commerce)

[**Mobile Apps** \
\
With the rapid growth of mobile commerce, businesses increasingly require complementary apps alongside their web presence. Our dedicated mobile app team is ready to assist you.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/solutions/mobile-apps)

[**Business Applications** \
\
In today's dynamic landscape, businesses require innovative software to stay competitive. We possess the skills and experience to develop these tools.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/solutions/business-applications)

[**AI & Data Science** \
\
We offer AI and Data Science services to unlock insights and drive innovation in diverse industries by harnessing the full potential of the data.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/solutions/ai-data-science)

[**Websites** \
\
We design and develop beautiful websites, which elevate your online presence and drive business growth.](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/solutions/websites)

[Discover more](https://www.pitsolutions.com/en/about-pits)

## We do everything with our core values of honesty, hard work and trust.

### Our vision

" To be a well-respected technology services company, known for its excellent technical team and flawless project deliveries. "

### Our mission

" To realise our dreams through efficient communication, honesty and respect towards our team, clients and other entities we deal or partner with. "

## Clients opinion about us

#### Dr. Kamila Markram

CEO, Frontiers Media SA

It has been an amazing journey and collaboration for more than a decade. Thanks to the entire PITS team for being part of Frontiers success story - up until now and in the future.

#### Ivo Bättig

Partner, Unic AG

PITS is our strong technology offshoring partner to realize technically challenging, high quality and exciting digitalization projects. We are looking forward to further extend our cooperation with PITS in the coming years.

#### Patrick Daxboeck

IT-Consultant, BIBUS AG Group

We have been collaborating for several years with PITS to realize our corporate web portal and web shop projects. It is always a great experience to work with such committed and motivated team of developers. Their unique mix of onsite office and offshore development center in India, helps us to move our project much faster and always within budget.

#### Thomas Dumm

CEO, Delivros Orell Füssli AG

I wanted to let you know that we are very happy with the work that PITS is doing for us. Everything runs in a controllable and predictable manner. Submitting issues, getting quotes, fixing, testing, deploying, billing all goes very smooth. Also, thank you and your team very much for your work!

#### Remo Ankli

Head of e-commerce, Zone Holding AG

It has been a pleasure to work with the Magento team from PITS to realize different complex ecommerce projects for our company. Our projects are much advanced than standard Magento system ie from challenging inventory handling to advanced email communications, from interfaces to various marketplaces to complex payment integrations. PITS did always a great job and I highly recommend PITS for your upcoming web shop projects.

#### Marc Brändli

Founder, unihockeyshop.ch

I have been collaborating with PITS over last several years for my ecommerce project. I was impressed by commitment of the developers working for my project. PITS offers a perfect solution for our needs - high quality solutions at affordable cost. Thanks to their Swiss office, I could even meet them when I have specific points to discuss with them in person.

Over the course of 24+ years, we have successfully collaborated on over 4000 projects, partnering with numerous clients to achieve their goals and deliver exceptional results, solidifying our reputation as a trusted IT solutions company that provides innovative and impactful services.
